name: @safe-global/protocol-kit
description: SDK that facilitates the interaction with Safe Smart Accounts

scripts.test:hardhat:web3:v1.0.0: export TEST_NETWORK=hardhat && export ETH_LIB=web3 && export SAFE_VERSION=1.0.0 && hardhat deploy && nyc hardhat test
